name: MTLPrimitiveAccelerationStructureDescriptor
desc: A description of an acceleration structure that contains geometry primitives.

items.name: var geometryDescriptors: [MTLAccelerationStructureGeometryDescriptor]?
items.desc: An array that contains the individual pieces of geometry that compose the acceleration structure.

items.name: var motionKeyframeCount: Int
items.desc: The number of keyframes in the geometry data.

items.name: var motionStartTime: Float
items.desc: The start time for the range of motion that the keyframe data describes.

items.name: var motionEndTime: Float
items.desc: The end time for the range of motion that the keyframe data describes.

items.name: var motionStartBorderMode: MTLMotionBorderMode
items.desc: The mode to use when handling timestamps before the start time.

items.name: var motionEndBorderMode: MTLMotionBorderMode
items.desc: The mode to use when handling timestamps after the end time.

items.name: enum MTLMotionBorderMode
items.desc: Options for specifying how the acceleration structure handles timestamps that are outside the specified range.
